item.text: Specify other
Does the patient record reflect accurate/active ICD10 codes, eg., old diagnosis(es) have been coded to 'history of' if no longer active/being treated?

Non-facet pathology per clinical assessment or diagnostic studies has ruled out other sources of the patient's pain, including but not limited to fractures, tumors, infections or significant deformity.

valueCoding.display: Negative for non-facet pathology sources:  Medical record indicates all of the following are ABSENT: active spine fractures, spine tumors, active infections, sciatica, hip osteoarthritis, sacroiliac impingement, untreated radiculopathy, neurogenic claudication, myofascial pain, compression fractures, disc herniation, osteophytes, rheumatoid arthritis, fibromyalgia.

Positive for non-facet pathology sources:  Medical record indicates one or more of the following are PRESENT: active spine fractures, spine tumors, active infections, sciatica, hip osteoarthritis, sacroiliac impingement, untreated radiculopathy, neurogenic claudication, myofascial pain, compression fractures, disc herniation, osteophytes, rheumatoid arthritis, fibromyalgia.
